FuncDef: The reset counters interface drop mru command clears MRU-based packet loss statistics from an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset counters interface GigabitEthernet3/0/0.4 drop mru
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After MRU-based packet loss statistics are generated on an interface, run the reset counters interface drop mru command to clear the existing statistics if you want to re-collect new statistics.
Prerequisites
An interface has been enabled to collect MRU-based packet loss statistics using the mru statistic enable command.
